trends: There has been one other sighting in Rives Junction
There were no other sightings in Rives Junction on or around September 14th 2013
divs: sighting detailsi was standing on my front porch, approximately, 9:30 - 9:45 pm on saturday (9\14\2013) and i was looking at the night sky (stars). to my right (south east, i saw 4 bright orange starlike objects. not moving, just "there" in formation (rectangle). they were very bright, then after about 15 - 20 seconds, started fading one by one, till they just vanished. there was no "flight path", they seemed to just be stationary. they didn't fade like some sort of firework burning out, they just became dim, then were gone. total time till the last one vanished was approximately 1 minute 45 seconds. i immeditately when i observed the objects thought to myself "this isn't normal", this isn't something that was shot into the sky or some sort of plane. i was struck by the fact that they seemed far enough away that they were "starlike", but they were brighter and they were definitely together, as they formed a rectangle.
Summary: Observed 4 Bright Orange, Star Like Lights, Rectangle Formation, Vanished One by One
